'''Radiant Spincrystal 107''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Demain, des l'aube]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located next to [[Antoine]] and the [[Aircraft]], [[West Slopes of Mont Automnequi]], [[Belleau Region]], [[Fontaine]].
